'''Dance! Dance! Dance!''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to watch all four characters complete their dance routine in the Drillbit Dance at the [[Nanatzcayan|Children of Echoes]].

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement may be a reference to the [[w:c:hsr:Dance! Dance! Dance!|Light Cone of the same name]] in ''Honkai: Star Rail'', another [[miHoYo]] game.
* The Indonesian name of this achievement is a reference to the song ''[https://youtu.be/HHwIfqqzsOk Kopi Dangdut]'' by Fahmi Shahab.
